about_the_game:
Space Overlord I got Isekai'd into a Sci fi World is a unique take on the Isekai genre. HuniePop-like interactions with quests, bosses, and Choice-Driven stories. Go on missions, take over the empire, or join the Renegade Pact. This game combines the best of all worlds: a dating sim, an Isekai manga, and a role-playing game.

Following your death in an attempt to save a little girl, you are transported to a Sci-Fi world as an Empire Pilot. After living a boring life until now you decide to be the ruler of the empire. One way or another. The goal is simple: romance the key figures in the galaxy in order to make an army strong enough to defeat the Empire.

Using your Isekai-System, you are able to read people's minds and perceive their disposition towards you. You'll be receiving interesting quests to enhance your relationship with the girls as you progress through the game. If you conquer the heart of a girl, you will receive special passive/active abilities to help you cope with the overwhelming number of ships ahead of you. As you voyage through the galaxy, you can upgrade your ship to become a powerful battleship or a swift assassination ship. Your choices throughout your story will shape who you are and how you are viewed in the galaxy. I wish you the best of luck and welcome, Overlord!

* Ten gorgeous girls with distinctive voices, personalities, and styles. Even certain side characters have romantic potential.

* A mixture of 2.5D and 3D elements with hundreds of unlockable and purchasable ship upgrades.

* Using Next-Gen lip-Syncing, every single character is professionally voice acted to increase immersion.

* An immersive AAA soundtrack and sound effects of all genres.

* Isekai-Systems allow you to take the upper hand against the Imperial Armada!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6+
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Graphics: 2 GB RAM

name: Space Overlord - I got Isekai'd into a Sci fi World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
